inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//severity count
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| summarize SeverityVolume= count() by LogSeverity

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//no. of concurrent sessions
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID  == '302010'
| extend ConcurrentSession= extract('%ASA-6-302010: ([0-9]*?) in use,',1,Message)
| summarize AvgSession=avg(toint(ConcurrentSession)) by TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Count by Action
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceAction != ''
| summarize ActionCount= count() by SimplifiedDeviceAction

content.PartTitle: Firewall Action Event Summary By Count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Max Sessions
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID  == '302010'
| extend MaxSessions= extract('%ASA-6-302010:.*, ([0-9].*?) most used',1,Message)
| summarize AvgSession=avg(toint(MaxSessions)) by TimeGenerated

content.PartTitle: Average Max Concurrent Sessions Time Trend

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//volume by time
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| summarize Volme=count() by TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//severity by time
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| summarize SeverityVolume= count() by LogSeverity, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 reason for packet drop
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID == '733100'
| extend TraficType= extract('%ASA-4-733100: \\[(.*?)\\]',1,Message)
| summarize AttackCount=count() by TraficType
| top 5 by AttackCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Communication direction count by time
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where CommunicationDirection != ''
| summarize DirectionVolume=count() by CommunicationDirection, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//out bound
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where CommunicationDirection contains   'outbound'
| summarize TrafficVolume=count() by SimplifiedDeviceAction, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//allowd vs denied for in bound
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where CommunicationDirection contains   'inbound'
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction in ('Deny', 'Allow')
| summarize TrafficVolume=count() by SimplifiedDeviceAction, TimeGenerated

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Communication direction count
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where CommunicationDirection != ''
| summarize DirectionVolume=count() by CommunicationDirection

content.PartTitle: Inbound Outbound Traffic Summary By Count

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Reason for packet Drop time trend
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID == '733100'
| extend TraficType= extract('%ASA-4-733100: \\[(.*?)\\]',1,Message)
| summarize AttackCount=count() by TraficType, TimeGenerated

content.PartTitle: Reason For Packet Dropping Time Trend

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 port inbound Allow 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco' 
| where DeviceEventClassID == '106100'  
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Allow' 
| where Message contains ' -> inside'  
| extend DestinationPortS=tostring(DestinationPort)   
| summarize PortCount=count() by DestinationPortS 
| top 5 by PortCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 port inbound deny
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where CommunicationDirection contains   'inbound'
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Deny'
| extend DestinationPortS=tostring(DestinationPort)
| summarize PortCount=count() by DestinationPortS
| top 5 by PortCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 port outbound Allow
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID == '106100'
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Allow'
| where Message contains ' -> management'
| extend DestinationPortS=tostring(DestinationPort)
| summarize PortCount=count() by DestinationPortS
| top 5 by PortCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 protocol Deny
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where Protocol != ''
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Deny'
| summarize ProtocolCount= count() by Protocol
| top 5 by ProtocolCount

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 protocol Allow
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where Protocol != ''
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Allow'
| summarize ProtocolCount= count() by Protocol
| top 5 by ProtocolCount

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Inbound Destination IP Addresses Blocked 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco' 
| where CommunicationDirection contains   'inbound' 
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Deny' 
| summarize IpCount= count()  by DestinationIP 
| top 5 by IpCount desc nulls last

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Inbound Destination IP Addresses Blocked

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Inbound Destination IP Addresses Allowed 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco' 
| where CommunicationDirection contains   'inbound' 
| where DestinationIP != '' 
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Allow' or SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Built' 
| summarize IpCount= count()  by DestinationIP 
| top 5 by IpCount desc nulls last

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Inbound Destination IP Addresses Allowed

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 outbound deny dst ip
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID == '106100'
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Deny'
| where Message contains ' -> management'
| summarize IpCount= count()  by DestinationIP
| top 5 by IpCount desc nulls last

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Outbound Destination IP Addresses Denied

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 5 outbound Allow dst ip
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID == '106100'
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Allow'
| where Message contains ' -> management'
| summarize IpCount= count()  by DestinationIP
| top 5 by IpCount desc nulls last

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Outbound Destination IP Addresses Allowed

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Inbound Source IP Addresses Denied 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco' 
| where CommunicationDirection contains   'inbound' 
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Deny' 
| summarize IpCount= count()  by SourceIP 
| top 5 by IpCount desc nulls last

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Inbound Source IP Addresses Denied

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Outbound Source IP Addresses Allowed 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco' 
| where CommunicationDirection contains   'outbound' 
| where SimplifiedDeviceAction == 'Built' 
| summarize IpCount= count()  by SourceIP 
| top 5 by IpCount desc nulls last

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Outbound Source IP Addresses Allowed

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//top 10 commands
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID == '111008'
| extend CommandExecuted= extract('%ASA-5-111008: User '.*?' executed the '(.*?)' command.',1,Message)
| summarize Count= count() by CommandExecuted
| top 5 by Count desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 Source IP Addresses By Failed Authentication 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco' 
| where DeviceEventClassID == '611102' 
| extend IPAddress= extract('%ASA-6-611102:.*: IP address: (.*?), Uname.*',1,Message) 
| summarize IPAddressCount=count() by IPAddress 
| top 5 by IPAddressCount desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 Source IP Addresses By Failed Authentication

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Login Attempts For Nonexistent User Account 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco' 
| where DeviceEventClassID == '113015' 
| extend ipaddress=extract('%ASA-6-113015:.*: user IP = (.*)$',1,Message) 
| summarize IPCount=count() by ipaddress 
| top 5 by  IPCount desc

content.PartTitle: Login Attempts For Nonexistent User Account By Source IP Addresses

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top 5 SSH Failed Attempt By Source IP 
CommonSecurityLog 
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA' 
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco' 
| where DeviceEventClassID == '315011' 
| extend IP= extract('%ASA-6-315011: SSH session from (.*) on',1,Message) 
| summarize  ReasonCount=count() by IP 
| top 5 by ReasonCount  desc

content.PartTitle: Top 5 SSH Failed Attempt By Source IP Addresses

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Authentocation Success
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'ASA'
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Cisco'
| where DeviceEventClassID == '113012'
| extend UserName= extract('%ASA-6-113012:.*: user = (.*)$',1,Message)
| summarize UserCount=count() by UserName
| top 5 by UserCount desc
